original_text: That is true. They were broken off because of their unbelief, but you stand fast through faith. So do not become proud, but fear.
korean_text: 옳도다 그들은 믿지 아니하므로 꺾이고 너는 믿으므로 섰느니라 높은 마음을 품지 말고 도리어 두려워하라

sentences.original_text: They were broken off because of their unbelief,
but you stand fast through faith.
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 당신은 믿음으로 굳게 서 있습니다.
